name: Coffey Drone Shooter
description:
In a strange world where drones and A.I has gotten close to wipe out humanity

Mubukulu grabs he's assault rifle in a last attempt to save what remains of the human race

Jump into this interactive experience as Mubukulu the African druglord from the village in zimbabwe and fend them off

Remember always to look for more ammo as you're going to need them

These drones can cheat and jump through walls

So always keep your health up

You never know where they might hide
